page.description: Specify how the ink is rendered in the FormView Layout.

description.p: Specify the height in 'ink units' ('ink unit' - assume an 8.5 inch wide page with 300 'ink dots per unit' - the width of the page would be 8.5 * 300 'ink units'). This property is only available if the *[ui:Ink bounds type]* is set to 'Explicit'.

Margin outside of the drawn area to be added to drawn ink. Specify value in 'ink units'. ('ink unit' - assume an 8.5 inch wide page with 300 'ink dots per unit' - the width of the page would be 8.5 * 300 'ink units') This property is only available if the *[ui:Ink bounds type]* is set to 'Ink'.
Specify the amount of ink to render.

item.name: Ink
item.description: Only render ink within the drawn portion.

item.name: Explicit
item.description: Define an explicit area of ink to draw.

description.p: Specify the width in 'ink units' ('ink unit' - assume an 8.5 inch wide page with 300 'ink dots per unit' - the width of the page would be 8.5 * 300 'ink units'.) This property is only available if the *[ui:Ink bounds type]* is set to 'Explicit'.

Specify the x value in 'ink units' ('ink unit' - assume an 8.5 inch wide page with 300 'ink dots per unit' - the width of the page would be 8.5 * 300 'ink units'.) This property is only available if the *[ui:Ink bounds type]* is set to 'Explicit'.

Specify the y value in 'ink units' ('ink unit' - assume an 8.5 inch wide page with 300 'ink dots per unit' - the width of the page would be 8.5 * 300 'ink units'.) This property is only available if the *[ui:Ink bounds type]* is set to 'Explicit'.
Specify the ink height (in pixels). You can leave this blank to use a default height. Only available if the *[ui:Sizing method]* is set to 'Width-Height'.
Specify the ink width (in pixels). Only available if the *[ui:Sizing method]* is set to 'Width-Height'.
Specify the scale of the ink. Only available if the *[ui:Sizing method]* is set to 'Scale'.
Defines how the ink is sized.

item.name: Width-Height
item.description: Specify a width and height for the ink.

item.name: Scale
item.description: Specify a scale for the ink.

description.p: Specifies the zoom factor for sizing the ink. Only available if the *[ui:Sizing method]* is set to 'Zoom'.
